name: Victory March Free
description:
Probably one of the best games for the iPhone.

Victory March Free is an action WW2 themed sideway runner game. In Victory March, you play as a Soviet or as an American soldier. Your goal is to run forward and jump from one platform to another. Our fearless heroes are fighting hordes of Nazis.

Some of the features of Victory March:

- simple and addictive gameplay
- awesome 3D graphics
- 2 gameplay modes
- number of different enemies
- range of weapons
- Retina Display support
- Game Center support (leaderboards and achievements)
- tanks and rockets

Enjoy Victory March!
